00059 typedef struct __orxRGBA_t
00060 {
00061   union
00062   {
00063     struct
00064     {
00065       orxU8 u8R, u8G, u8B, u8A;
00066     };
00067 
00068     orxU32  u32RGBA;
00069   };
00070 
00071 } orxRGBA;
00072 
00073 #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)        orxRGBA_Set((orxU8)(R), (orxU8)(G), (orxU8)(B), (orxU8)(A))
00074 #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)             RGBA.u8R
00075 #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)             RGBA.u8G
00076 #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)             RGBA.u8B
00077 #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)             RGBA.u8A
00078 
00079 #define orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER         (orx2F(1.0f / 255.0f))
00080 #define orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER       (orx2F(255.0f))

00286 static orxINLINE orxRGBA          orxRGBA_Set(orxU8 _u8R, orxU8 _u8G, orxU8 _u8B, orxU8 _u8A)
00287 {
00288   orxRGBA stResult;
00289   
00290   // Updates result
00291   stResult.u8R = _u8R;
00292   stResult.u8G = _u8G;
00293   stResult.u8B = _u8B;
00294   stResult.u8A = _u8A;
00295 
00296   // Done!
00297   return stResult;
00298 }

00306 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGBA(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxRGBA _stRGBA)
00307 {
00308   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00309 
00310   /* Checks */
00311   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00312 
00313   /* Stores RGB */
00314   orxVector_Set(&(_pstColor->vRGB), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_R(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_G(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_B(_stRGBA)));
00315 
00316   /* Stores alpha */
00317   _pstColor->fAlpha = orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxRGBA_A(_stRGBA);
00318 
00319   /* Done! */
00320   return pstResult;
00321 }
00322 
00329 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Set(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00330 {
00331   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00332 
00333   /* Checks */
00334   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00335 
00336   /* Stores RGB */
00337   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00338 
00339   /* Stores alpha */
00340   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00341 
00342   /* Done! */
00343   return pstResult;
00344 }

00351 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB)
00352 {
00353   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00354 
00355   /* Checks */
00356   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00357   orxASSERT(_pvRGB != orxNULL);
00358 
00359   /* Stores components */
00360   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00361 
00362   /* Done! */
00363   return pstResult;
00364 }

00371 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetAlpha(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00372 {
00373   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00374 
00375   /* Checks */
00376   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00377 
00378   /* Stores it */
00379   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00380 
00381   /* Done! */
00382   return pstResult;

00384 
00389 static orxINLINE orxRGBA          orxColor_ToRGBA(const orxCOLOR *_pstColor)
00390 {
00391   orxRGBA   stResult;
00392   orxVECTOR vColor;
00393   orxFLOAT  fAlpha;
00394 
00395   /* Checks */
00396   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00397 
00398   /* Clamps RGB components */
00399   orxVector_Clamp(&vColor, &(_pstColor->vRGB), &orxVECTOR_0, &orxVECTOR_WHITE);
00400 
00401   /* De-normalizes vector */
00402   orxVector_Mulf(&vColor, &vColor, orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER);
00403 
00404   /* Clamps alpha */
00405   fAlpha = orxCLAMP(_pstColor->fAlpha, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00406 
00407   /* Updates result */
00408   stResult = orx2RGBA(orxF2U(vColor.fR), orxF2U(vColor.fG), orxF2U(vColor.fB), orxF2U(orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER * fAlpha));
00409 
00410   /* Done! */
00411   return stResult;
00412 }
00413 
00419 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Copy(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00420 {
00421   /* Checks */
00422   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00423   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00424 
00425   /* Copies it */
00426   orxMemory_Copy(_pstDst, _pstSrc, sizeof(orxCOLOR));
00427 
00428   /* Done! */
00429   return _pstDst;
00430 }
00431 
00437 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSL(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00438 {
00439   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00440   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00441 
00442   /* Checks */
00443   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00444   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00445 
00446   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00447   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00448   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00449   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00450 
00451   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00452   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00453   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00454   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00455 
00456   /* Stores lightness */
00457   pstResult->vHSL.fL = orx2F(0.5f) * (fMax + fMin);
00458 
00459   /* Gray? */
00460   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00461   {
00462     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00463     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00464   }
00465   else
00466   {
00467     /* Updates saturation */
00468     pstResult->vHSL.fS = (pstResult->vHSL.fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00469                        ? fDelta / (fMax + fMin)
00470                        : fDelta / (orx2F(2.0f) - fMax - fMin);
00471 
00472     /* Red tone? */
00473     if(fR == fMax)
00474     {
00475       /* Updates hue */
00476       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00477     }
00478     /* Green tone? */
00479     else if(fG == fMax)
00480     {
00481       /* Updates hue */
00482       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00483     }
00484     /* Blue tone */
00485     else
00486     {
00487       /* Updates hue */
00488       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00489     }
00490 
00491     /* Clamps hue */
00492     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00493     {
00494       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00495     }
00496     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00497     {
00498       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00499     }
00500   }
00501 
00502   /* Updates alpha */
00503   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00504 
00505   /* Done! */
00506   return pstResult;
00507 }
00508 
00514 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSLToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00515 {
00516   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00517   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fL;
00518 
00519 #define orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(RESULT, ALT, CHROMA, HUE)                      \
00520 do                                                                                \
00521 {                                                                                 \
00522   if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f))                                                    \
00523   {                                                                               \
00524     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * HUE * (CHROMA - ALT));                          \
00525   }                                                                               \
00526   else if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 2.0f))                                               \
00527   {                                                                               \
00528     RESULT = CHROMA;                                                              \
00529   }                                                                               \
00530   else if(HUE < orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))                                               \
00531   {                                                                               \
00532     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * (CHROMA - ALT) * (orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) - HUE));   \
00533   }                                                                               \
00534   else                                                                            \
00535   {                                                                               \
00536     RESULT = ALT;                                                                 \
00537   }                                                                               \
00538   if(RESULT < orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                                                 \
00539   {                                                                               \
00540     RESULT = orxFLOAT_0;                                                          \
00541   }                                                                               \
00542   else if(RESULT > orxFLOAT_1 - orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                               \
00543   {                                                                               \
00544     RESULT = orxFLOAT_1;                                                          \
00545   }                                                                               \
00546 }                                                                                 \
00547 while(orxFALSE)
00548 
00549   /* Checks */
00550   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00551   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00552 
00553   /* Gets source hue, saturation and lightness components */
00554   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00555   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00556   fL = _pstSrc->vRGB.fL;
00557 
00558   /* Gray? */
00559   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00560   {
00561     /* Updates result */
00562     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fL);
00563   }
00564   else
00565   {
00566     orxFLOAT fChroma, fIntermediate;
00567 
00568     /* Gets chroma */
00569     fChroma = (fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00570             ? fL + (fL * fS)
00571             : fL + fS - (fL * fS);
00572 
00573     /* Gets intermediate value */
00574     fIntermediate = (orx2F(2.0f) * fL) - fChroma;
00575 
00576     /* Gets RGB components */
00577     if(fH > orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))
00578     {
00579       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00580     }
00581     else
00582     {
00583       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00584     }
00585     orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fG, fIntermediate, fChroma, fH);
00586     if(fH < orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f))
00587     {
00588       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00589     }
00590     else
00591     {
00592       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00593     }
00594   }
00595 
00596   /* Updates alpha */
00597   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00598 
00599   /* Done! */
00600   return pstResult;
00601 }
00602 
00608 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSV(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00609 {
00610   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00611   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00612 
00613   /* Checks */
00614   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00615   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00616 
00617   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00618   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00619   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00620   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00621 
00622   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00623   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00624   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00625   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00626 
00627   /* Stores value */
00628   pstResult->vHSL.fV = fMax;
00629 
00630   /* Gray? */
00631   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00632   {
00633     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00634     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00635   }
00636   else
00637   {
00638     /* Updates saturation */
00639     pstResult->vHSL.fS = fDelta / fMax;
00640 
00641     /* Red tone? */
00642     if(fR == fMax)
00643     {
00644       /* Updates hue */
00645       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00646     }
00647     /* Green tone? */
00648     else if(fG == fMax)
00649     {
00650       /* Updates hue */
00651       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00652     }
00653     /* Blue tone */
00654     else
00655     {
00656       /* Updates hue */
00657       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00658     }
00659 
00660     /* Clamps hue */
00661     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00662     {
00663       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00664     }
00665     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00666     {
00667       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00668     }
00669   }
00670 
00671   /* Updates alpha */
00672   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00673 
00674   /* Done! */
00675   return pstResult;
00676 }
00677 
00683 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSVToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00684 {
00685   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00686   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fV;
00687 
00688   /* Checks */
00689   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00690   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00691 
00692   /* Gets source hue, saturation and value components */
00693   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00694   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00695   fV = _pstSrc->vRGB.fV;
00696 
00697   /* Gray? */
00698   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00699   {
00700     /* Updates result */
00701     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fV);
00702   }
00703   else
00704   {
00705     orxFLOAT fFullHue, fSector, fIntermediate;
00706 
00707     /* Gets intermediate value */
00708     fIntermediate = fV * fS;
00709 
00710     /* Gets full hue & sector */
00711     fFullHue  = orx2F(6.0f) * fH;
00712     fSector   = orxMath_Floor(fFullHue);
00713 
00714     /* Depending on sector */
00715     switch(orxF2U(fSector))
00716     {
00717       default:
00718       case 0:
00719       {
00720         /* Updates RGB components */
00721         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00722         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00723         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00724 
00725         break;
00726       }
00727 
00728       case 1:
00729       {
00730         /* Updates RGB components */
00731         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00732         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00733         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00734 
00735         break;
00736       }
00737 
00738       case 2:
00739       {
00740         /* Updates RGB components */
00741         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00742         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00743         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00744 
00745         break;
00746       }
00747 
00748       case 3:
00749       {
00750         /* Updates RGB components */
00751         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00752         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00753         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00754 
00755         break;
00756       }
00757 
00758       case 4:
00759       {
00760         /* Updates RGB components */
00761         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00762         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00763         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00764 
00765         break;
00766       }
00767 
00768       case 5:
00769       {
00770         /* Updates RGB components */
00771         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00772         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00773         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00774 
00775         break;
00776       }
00777     }
00778   }
00779 
00780   /* Updates alpha */
00781   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00782 
00783   /* Done! */
00784   return pstResult;
00785 }

00789  * Functions extended by plugins
00790  ***************************************************************************/
